founded.name: Impact
founded.founders: Michelle Andrews, Joelene Latief (Omicron), Tim Chau (Rho)
founded.description: Impact is the digital destination for young people shaping the future. We reach 10M people each month with our content. In 2021, we garnered 1 billion content views, raised $370K for social good, and were featured in Forbes 30U30.

founded.name: Irrational Media
founded.description: Irrational Media is a social media agency with communities of millions of followers. Our content reaches 35M people and garners 350mm+ impressions each month. We've worked with brands like TikTok, BeautyBlender, Netflix, Tinder, & MSCHF.
